justification: "Across developmental studies of model-based control, the sequential decision-task used to measure model-based control was developed by Daw and colleagues … and we refer to this as the Daw two-step task."
"Participants performed 200 trials of the two-step task developed by Kool and colleagues. This allowed us to measure increases in model-based control when comparing high stakes to low stakes."

justification: "Participants completed … a computer adaptive IQ test (CAT; Raven, 2000)."
